# MarketplaceDirect.createListingsBatch property

Create a batch of new listings

## Example

```javascript
const listings = [...];
const tx = await contract.direct.createListingsBatch(listings);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
createListingsBatch: {
        (listings: NewDirectListing[]): Promise<TransactionResultWithId<never>[]>;
        prepare: (listings: NewDirectListing[]) => Promise<Transaction<TransactionResultWithId<never>[]>>;
    };
```

## Remarks

Create a batch of new listings on the marketplace
